page.title: 06New comers to the area.
page.content: Gareth Garstang has recently moved to Stepaside. He writes "We moved down with another family that we knew. My brother has trouble with his chest especially in the damp of Warrington. I have been on holiday here before and I think that it is very nice. My mum and dad decided to move down because of my brothers chest. We live in Pleasant Valley. I have found that everybody takes his time here and nothing has to be exact. The first few weeks I thought I was on holiday. The school is very different from my old school which had 300 pupils. Moving here has been a different kind of life." Yan Garstang is eight and likes going fishing and his house is called Cherry Grove. The family is going to have bed and breakfast in their new house which has l4 rooms.
